mapper.select: SELECT M.MGR_NUM , M.MGR_NM , M.MEMB_ID , M.SEC_NUM , M.EMAIL , M.TEL_NUM , M.MOBIL_NUM , M.REG_DTIME , M.HIGH_MGR_NUM , M.MEMB_CD , M.MAIL_CD , D.CATE_NM AS MEMB_CD_NM, C.CATE_NM AS MAIL_CD_NM FROM MGR M INNER JOIN CD D ON M.MEMB_CD = D.CD INNER JOIN CD C ON M.MAIL_CD = C.CD WHERE MEMB_ID = #{MEMB_ID} AND SEC_NUM = #{SEC_NUM}
